header.heading: Join A New Generation Of Logistics!
header.paragraph: Redefining how you ship, track, collect, deliver all through innovative tech-solutions and efficient operations.

services.heading: Empowering businesses with our services and solutions

Overnight_delivery.heading: Overnight delivery
Overnight_delivery.paragraph: Get orders delivered on the very next day! Guaranteed with a success rate of 96%, one of the highest rates in the region’s logistics market.

Next_day.heading: Next-day cash collection
Next_day.paragraph: Empower your business’s cash cycle with Egypt's fastest cash collection service. Only in 24 hours.

Premium_fulfillment.heading: Premium fulfillment service
Premium_fulfillment.paragraph: Store, sell, ship! It takes only 3 steps with Bosta’s fulfillment solution to reach your customers and boost your sales.

Full_financial.heading: Full financial visibility
Full_financial.paragraph: Have live updates day by day about your financials through Bosta’s Wallet available in our dashboard.

Shipping_Egypt.heading: Shipping all over Egypt
Shipping_Egypt.paragraph: Bosta offers a full coverage delivery experience with +20 distribution centers all over Egypt and counting.

Worldwide_Shipping.heading: Worldwide Shipping
Worldwide_Shipping.paragraph: Import all your materials and goods from anywhere in the world and receive them at your doorstep in Egypt with Bosta Box.

success.heading: Get to know our success but in numbers
success.price__paragraph: We customize your pricing plan based on your needs. Tailor your own with our sales team and we guarantee a sky-rocketing shipping experience and sales rates.

partner.heading: Egypt’s #1 Shipping Partner Fo
partner.Business__paragraph: Bosta can equip your logistic operations with efficient tools and innovative tech solutions — dashboard, plugins, and API integrations.
partner.Small__Business__paragraph: We ensure seamless delivery operations for your small or mid-sized hustle with our super-smooth mobile app.
partner.trusted__heading: Trusted by top companies in the region

isProblem: Is there a problem with your shipment?!
